subject: Watch the pounds disappear
body:
I was born overweight and teased because of it most of my younger years. Finally at age 30 I took the initialtive and purchased a 4 month supply of Anatrim. I have since shed 34 pounds of unwanted weight and have a new enthusiasm for life! I go out more, socialize more, and have even met a special lady who I love. I credit much of my new-found happiness to the weight I lost and your product. Try IT
http://www.vepin.hk/?196lfxwng
